recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OF DECISION AND ORDER that Petitioner's Amended  154  Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED. The Clerk of Court shall enter judgment accordingly. Petitioner's  178  Motion for Discovery, to Expand the Record and for Eviden tiary Hearing is DENIED. The stay of execution entered by this Court on 04/16/02, is VACATED. A Certificate of Appealability as to the following issues: Whether Claim 1 of the Amended Petition is procedurally barred and/or without merit. Whether Claim 13 of the Amended Petition is without merit. The Clerk of Court forward a courtesy copy of this Order to the Clerk of the Arizona Supreme Court. Signed by Judge Susan R Bolton on 03/17/09. (NOTE: see attached pdf for full detail) (ESL)
